name: Fog-cutting lenses
body:
Price 1800gp Usage Worn Bulk L - These goggles are made of carefully-polished rock crystal, with frames of polished brass and a simple leather strap and buckle sized for a giant's head (but easily adjustable for smaller wearers). The goggles distort and skew vision strangely, causing a -4 penalty on Perception checks.
Activate (A) interact; Frequency once per day; Duration 1 minute; Effect The goggles allow you to see through magical and normal fogs, mists, and similar obscurement. They do not confer darkvision or low-light vision. Creatures are not concealed to you by such effects.
